description.value:
[Slotless]

Effect You gain access to either the ranger feat @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Relentless Stalker] or the skill feat @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Wilderness Spotter]. Once you have taken one of these feats, check the box next to this boon and cross the other one out.
